question:
You are working for a company. You need some time off from work and want to ask our manager about this.
Write a letter to ur manager. In ur letter
. explain why you want to take time off from work.
. give details of the amount of time you need.
. suggest how your work could be covered while you are away.
text: I am writing requesting you two weeks leave in the next month.

On the 22nd April 2018, my sister is entering into conjugal relation and my parents anticipate making this occasion a memory. Inorder to add bliss and fulfill certain traditional rites my presence is demanded, which compels me to request this leave starting the 15th April 2018 and will report on the 29th April 2018.

I can anticipate your concern regarding my office work. I have perfectly organized the schedule and delegated jobs that would not cause hindrance to production any deviations will be well taken care by the assistant manager. However, I will be available via phone for any emergencies.
I would be grateful if you could grant me this leave that would allow us to make this event a success and a memory of our life time and finally invite you to grace and shower your warm blessings.
